text.0:
Social media claims that CNN used an image of one of the first Covid-19 vaccination recipients in a story back in October are false.

The screenshot offered as evidence shows a CNN article from October with a current rolling news video at the top.

https://t.co/PHnMHQeBhp
text.1:
We’ve seen various claims that ingredients in the Pfizer vaccine are harmful, but there is no evidence to back these up.

https://t.co/HQQrvcYqwF
text.2:
Thank you so much to everyone that donated to Full Fact and helped us reach our target in the Big Give Christmas Challenge.

text.3: The Conservative Party has now deleted their tweet.
